introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this video is じんめい which you will often hear in emergencies, disaster response, medical situations, and legal or ethical discussions. Imagine how much more natural your Japanese will sound when you can say things like We must prioritize human life over property., Saving human lives is our top priority in a disaster., and The law protects human life from harm. Let's get started!
meaning_explanation_english: The word じんめい means human life, the life of a person regarded as something to be protected, saved, or valued, often used in emergencies, legal, or ethical contexts.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 生命 : せいめい : life
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the じんめい are せいめい and いのち. せいめい emphasizes biological or scientific life and can be used for humans and other living things, while いのち is a more general or poetic term for life. じんめい specifically refers to human life in contexts like emergencies, law, and ethics where the value or protection of a person's life is highlighted.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the じんめい are し and しぼう. し refers to death in general, the end of life, while しぼう often appears in contexts like casualties or recorded deaths; both denote the absence of じんめい and are used when life is lost or cannot be saved.

example_sentences.kanji: 医者が人命を救いました。
example_sentences.furigana: 医者(いしゃ)が人命(じんめい)を救(すく)いました。

translations.VI: Một bác sĩ đã cứu mạng một người.
translations.FR: Un médecin a sauvé une vie.
translations.ZH: 一名医生救了一条人命。
translations.TL: Isang doktor ang nagsagip ng buhay.
translations.MY: ဆရာဝန်တစ်ဦးသည် လူတစ်ဦး၏ အသက်ကို ကယ်တင်ခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: एक डॉक्टर ने किसी की जान बचाई।
translations.FA: یک پزشک جان یک نفر را نجات داد.

example_sentences.kanji: 消防士は人命を守る仕事です。
example_sentences.furigana: 消防士(しょうぼうし)は人命(じんめい)を守る(まもる)仕事(しごと)です。

translations.EN: The job of firefighters is to protect lives.
translations.ID: Pekerjaan pemadam kebakaran adalah melindungi nyawa manusia.
translations.ES: El trabajo de los bomberos es proteger vidas.
translations.VI: Công việc của lính cứu hỏa là bảo vệ tính mạng con người.
translations.FR: Le métier des pompiers est de protéger des vies.
translations.NE: दमकलकर्मीहरूको काम मानवीय जीवन जोगाउनु हो।
translations.BN: দমকলকর্মীদের কাজ মানুষের জীবন রক্ষা করা।
translations.ZH: 消防员的工作是保护生命。
translations.TL: Trabaho ng mga bumbero ang protektahan ang buhay ng mga tao.
translations.MY: မီးသတ်သမားများရဲ့ အလုပ်က လူ့အသက်ကို ကာကွယ်ပေးခြင်းဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: दमकल कर्मियों का काम लोगों की जान की रक्षा करना है।
translations.AR: وظيفة رجال الإطفاء هي حماية أرواح الناس.
translations.FA: کار آتش‌نشانان محافظت از جان انسان‌ها است.

example_sentences.kanji: この事故は人命にかかわります。
example_sentences.furigana: この事故(じこ)は人命(にんめい)にかかわります。

translations.ID: Kecelakaan ini berdampak pada nyawa manusia.
translations.ES: Este accidente afecta a vidas humanas.
translations.VI: Vụ tai nạn này ảnh hưởng đến tính mạng con người.
translations.FR: Cet accident affecte des vies humaines.
translations.NE: यो दुर्घटनाले मानव जीवनलाई असर गर्छ।
translations.BN: এই দুর্ঘটনা মানুষের প্রাণকে প্রভাবিত করে।
translations.TL: Ang aksidenteng ito ay nakakaapekto sa buhay ng tao.
translations.MY: ဒီ မတော်တဆမှုဟာ လူအသက်နဲ့ ဆက်နွယ်တယ်။
translations.HI: यह दुर्घटना मानव जीवन को प्रभावित करती है।
translations.AR: هذا الحادث يؤثر على أرواح البشر.
translations.FA: این حادثه بر جان انسان‌ها تأثیر می‌گذارد.

example_sentences.furigana: 人命(じんめい)第一(だいいち)です。

translations.ES: La vida humana es lo primero.
translations.VI: Sinh mạng con người là ưu tiên hàng đầu.
translations.TL: Ang buhay ng tao ang pinakamahalaga.
translations.MY: လူ့ဘ၀ကို ဦးစားပေးရမည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 人命(じんめい)尊重(そんちょう)は大切(たいせつ)です。

translations.ES: Respetar la vida humana es importante.
translations.VI: Tôn trọng mạng người là quan trọng.
translations.FR: Le respect de la vie humaine est important.
translations.TL: Mahalaga ang paggalang sa buhay ng tao.
translations.MY: လူ့အသက်ကိုလေးစားရခြင်းသည်အရေးကြီးသည်။
translations.HI: मानव जीवन का सम्मान महत्वपूर्ण है।
translations.FA: احترام به جان انسان مهم است.

example_sentences.kanji: 台風で人命被害が出ました。
example_sentences.furigana: 台風(たいふう)で人命被害(じんめいひがい)が出(で)ました。

translations.EN: There were casualties from the typhoon.
translations.ES: Hubo víctimas mortales a causa del tifón.
translations.VI: Do bão, đã có thương vong về người.
translations.FR: Il y a eu des pertes humaines à cause du typhon.
translations.TL: Dahil sa bagyo, nagkaroon ng mga nasawi.
translations.AR: حدثت خسائر في الأرواح بسبب الإعصار.
translations.FA: در اثر طوفان تلفات جانی رخ داد.

example_sentences.kanji: あの会社は人命軽視です。
example_sentences.furigana: あの会社(かいしゃ)は人命(じんめい)軽視(けいし)です。

translations.ES: Esa empresa desprecia la vida humana.
translations.VI: Công ty đó xem nhẹ tính mạng con người.
translations.FR: Cette entreprise néglige la vie humaine.
translations.NE: त्यो कम्पनीले मानिसको जीवनलाई बेवास्ता गर्छ।
translations.BN: সেই কোম্পানিটি মানুষের জীবনকে অবহেলা করে।
translations.ZH: 那家公司轻视人的生命。
translations.TL: Ang kumpanyang iyon ay hindi pinapahalagahan ang buhay ng tao.
translations.MY: အဲ့ဒီကုမ္ပဏီက လူ့အသက်ကို ဂရုမစိုက်ပါ။
translations.HI: उस कंपनी ने मानव जीवन की अनदेखी की है।
translations.FA: آن شرکت به جان انسان‌ها بی‌توجهی می‌کند.
